root.name: Sonny's Race for the Chocolatey Taste
root.description: Story Sonny the Cuckoo Bird has entered the titular Race for the Chocolatey Taste. He must succeed the race's four legs in order to win. Gameplay The game takes place in four locales with five stages each: The Himalayas: SnowboardingThe Canadian Rockies: Mountain BikingThe Amazon River: KayakingVenice Beach, California: Skateboarding The main objective of the game is to dodge obstacles and reach the exit before the time limit expires. Along the way you must collect coins, chocolate pieces, and Cocoa Puffs cereal (invulnerability). The fifth level of each locale is a bonus stage. TriviaThe game came free with the purchase of a specially marked box of Cocoa Puffs cereal.The disc came with 1000 free hours of America Online (for 45 days). The disc also came with a 1-chapter demo of Hulabee's Moop Dreadly: The Treasure on Bing Bong Island.
